name: Adam Driver
summary: Adam Driver. Actor: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens. Adam Douglas Driver was born in San Diego, California. His mother, Nancy (Needham) Wright, is a paralegal from Mishawaka, Indiana, and his father, Joe Douglas Driver, who has deep roots in the American South, is from Little Rock, Arkansas. His stepfather is a Baptist minister. His ancestry includes Dutch, English, German, Irish and Scottish. Driver was raised in Mishawaka...
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars | 63 wins & 140 nominations total
